Solution:   Create new test file for assignment tests.

patch 8.2.1723: Vim9: Variable argument name cannot start with underscore

Problem:    Vim9: Variable argument name cannot start with underscore.
Solution:   Use eval_isnamec1(). (closes #6988)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1723: Vim9: Variable argument name cannot start with unders… · vim/vim@2802272
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1723: Vim9: Variable argument name cannot start with unders… · vim/vim@2802272
attachments.text: …core Problem: Vim9: Variable argument name cannot start with underscore. Solution: Use eval_isnamec1(). (closes #6988)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dbd759309b4b6abea96b18d61770e100cf4264b5|patch 8.2.1722: Vim9: cannot assign a lambda to a variable of type fu…>
patch 8.2.1722: Vim9: cannot assign a lambda to a variable of type function

Problem:    Vim9: cannot assign a lambda to a variable of type function.
Solution:   Allow for assigning a partial to a variable of type function.
            (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #6996)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1722: Vim9: cannot assign a lambda to a variable of type fu… · vim/vim@dbd7593

attachments.text: …nction Problem: Vim9: cannot assign a lambda to a variable of type function. Solution: Allow for assigning a partial to a variable of type function. (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #6996)

patch 8.2.1721: MS-Windows installer doesn't work

Problem:    MS-Windows installer doesn't work.
Solution:   Write "Russian" in ASCII. (closes #6995, see #).

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1721: MS-Windows installer doesn't work · vim/vim@7f9c9c5

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/078269bdce7e75d5693c7313d92a229786bb95ee|patch 8.2.1720: Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed>
patch 8.2.1720: Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed. (Dominique
            Pellé)
Solution:   Don't clear the list items. (closes #6991)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1720: Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed · vim/vim@078269b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1720: Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed · vim/vim@078269b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak with heredoc that isn't executed. (Dominique Pellé) Solution: Don't clear the list items. (closes #6991)
